title: Hello from Info Page!
Bonjour de la Page d’accueil !
Hola desde la página de bienvenida!
body: You can even render links in your translations Google, Apple.
Vous pouvez même restituer des liens dans vos traductions Google, Apple.
Incluso pueden hacer enlaces en sus traducciones Google, Apple.
click-here: This local translation 'click-here' overrides the global 'click-here' key
Traductions locales peuvent substituer les étiquettes des traductions globales
Las traducciones locales pueden reemplazar las etiquetas de traducción global

title: Jurassic Park
Le Jurassic Park
El Jurassic Park
plot: During a preview tour, a theme park suffers a major power breakdown that allows its cloned dinosaur exhibits to run amok.
Pretend I'm in French - During a preview tour, a theme park suffers a major power breakdown that allows its cloned dinosaur exhibits to run amok.
Pretend I'm in Spanish - During a preview tour, a theme park suffers a major power breakdown that allows its cloned dinosaur exhibits to run amok.
review: Pretend I'm in French - Needs more dinosaurs
Pretend I'm in Spanish - Needs more dinosaurs
